text: @fred_guttenberg I thought CNN had decided to stop covering these horse and pony shows! Today he realized most of his base is succumbing to Covid-19 so he decided it was important to pretend to care #Covid_19 #TrumpVirusCoverup #CNN #StopTheSpread #TrumpLiedPeopleDied

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
